tool_description: The WebScreenshotAPI allows you to capture screenshots of web pages and retrieve them as images. It's a powerful tool for generating visual content from URLs.
name: web Capture Api
title: web Capture Api

api_list.name: webpage2pdf
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts a URL, height, and width as parameters, captures a screenshot of the specified web page, and returns the pdf

api_list.name: CaptureScreenshot
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts a URL, height, and width as parameters, captures a screenshot of the specified web page, and returns the screenshot as a downloadable image in PNG format. Use this endpoint to easily generate web page screenshots for various applications.
